author: Staff Reporter
text:
Bringing together music and paintings, fifty artists from the city will be depicting composer Ilayaraja’s music on canvas at Spaces in Besant Nagar on January 31.

The initiative, organised by actor Nasser, president of the South Indian Artiste’s Association and director S.P. Jhananathan and Chandrasekaran, former Principal, College of Fine Arts, will honour the musician, who has scored music for 1,000 films.
title: Ilayaraja’s music on canvas
